aboutSection.title: Who is Samuel?
aboutSection.paragraphOne: I've been part of the programming world since 2019, with a special passion for music and horror movies. I'm driven by continuous learning — I love discovering new things and solving challenges that require logic and creativity.
aboutSection.paragraphTwo: In both my personal and professional projects, I strive to use the best practices and tools to build high-quality software, always aiming to deliver more than just code. To me, development is a full process, and that's exactly why I'm so passionate about Software Engineering.

list.title: Talent Portal
list.description: Project developed at Senior Sistemas. Faced major challenges during implementation, especially due to the backend being based on Hexagonal Architecture and built using microservices.

list.title: Rest Countries
list.description: Project created to consume the Rest Countries API, allowing filtering, detailed view, search, and theme switching.

list.title: Room Homepage
list.description: FrontEnd Mentor project focused on using Sass as a preprocessor to structure responsiveness.

list.title: Gabarita Lab
list.description: Worked on a project for a company that supports students with college entrance exams. Contributed with essential layout and structural improvements and added new sections.

list.title: Easy Bank
list.description: FrontEnd Mentor challenge. Fully responsive layout built entirely with TailwindCSS.

Multidisciplinary development role, contributing to three HR-related products: Talent Portal, Recruitment and Selection, and Onboarding. Most of the time was dedicated to the Talent Portal, a job board built with Spring and Angular, focused on clean architecture, accessibility, and mobile-first design.

Cross-platform freelance work delivering projects through Fiverr, 99Freelas, Upwork, and Workana. Main deliveries involved automation, such as a spreadsheet generator based on cryptocurrency quotes and a video generator for Instagram. Delivered projects using different technologies, with a focus on Python.

Fiverr ProfileUpwork Profile99Freelas Profile

Worked on the Tasy medical system, delivering customizations and bug fixes for the Finance and Accounting (F&A) department across all platforms offered: Delphi, Java Swing, and HTML5 (Angular/Spring).

list.title: Software Engineering
list.description: Bachelor's degree covering topics such as Programming, Data Structures, Systems and Architectures, Software Management and Development, among others.

list.title: Computer Technician
list.description: Technical-level education focused on Programming, Databases, Software Engineering, and Networks.
